sentences.sContent: A good strong cup of coffee is just what I need right now.
sentences.sCn: 我现在正需要喝一杯浓浓的咖啡。

sentences.sContent: The house was large and roomy; just right for us.
sentences.sCn: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。

sentences.sContent: She looks just like her mother.
It’s nothing serious – just a small cut.
sentences.sCn: 不要紧，只不过是个小伤口。

sentences.sContent: John’s just told me that he’s getting married.
sentences.sCn: 约翰刚刚告诉我他要结婚了。

sentences.sContent: ...I was feeling so intentional and strong that I wasn’t going to let fear just take over...
...This used bike is a blue medium-sized Giant race bicycle I bought just six months before...
...That just wasn't where the scene was...
...with just a small proportion of consumers preferring more luxurious alternatives...
...you wouldn’t expect to turn up and just be able to run it...
...Often the best ideas for big changes come from unexpected places — it’s just a matter of tuning in...
...but piecing together information from all facial features just as humans do...
...Fantastic! I'll just wait in the lobby...
...You feel the same emotions—it is just as raw...

synos.tran: 只是，仅仅；刚才，刚刚；正好，恰好；实在；刚要
[法]公正的，合理的；正直的，正义的；正确的；公平的；应得的

phrases.pCn: 就在那时，正当那时；正在那时
还是；完全一样；照旧（等于all the same）

words.tran: 有正当理由的；合乎情理的；事出有因的
可辩解的，有道理的；可证明为正当的
无可非议地；言之有理地
公正地；正当地；恰当地；正直地
调整（justify的过去分词）；证明…正当
